    public class Parameters
extends java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>
    Implements operations of getting and setting the algorithm parameters.

    diegoj

      • assertExtendedArg

        public static java.lang.String assertExtendedArg(java.lang.String[] args,
                                                 int pos,
                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                 double llim,
                                                 double rlim)
        Assert the program arguments which depends on the specific algorithm.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments of the program.
        pos - Position in the array of strings.
        name - Name of the argument.
        llim - Left value of the interval in which the argument is (only used if the argument is numeric)
        rlim - Right value of the interval in which the argument is (only used if the argument is numeric)
        Returns:
        String with the argument.

                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values)
        Assert the program arguments which depends on the specific algorithm.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments of the program.
        pos - Position in the array of strings.
        name - Name of the argument.
        values - Posibly values of the parameter.
        Returns:
        String with the argument.

                                               int pos,

        Assert a double arguments which depends on the specific algorithm.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments of the program.
        pos - Position in the array of strings.
        name - Name of the argument.
        llim - Left value of the interval in which the argument is.

        Returns:
        Argument as double.
